column4: I have a small acer laptop with 10.4.4 LTS installed and am wondering why the update manager is not offering 12.04   Shouldn't it?
given the substantial nature of the changes i would recommend trying a livecd first and then if you do decide to upgrade you might elect to reinstall
with older hardware i would be worried that the graphics card may not be good enough for a decent 12.04 experience, especially if you have something more "netbook-esque"
